CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 11, 1952, pg. 6, reads: "Billy Graham At AME Meet - One of the highlights of the Pittsburgh AME Annual Conference, held at Bethel AME Church last week, was the presence of Billy Graham, who spoke nearly one half hour in Friday morning session. He stressed the point that we were all one at the 'Foot of the Cross.' Left to right are the Rev. John H. Little, Bishop A.J. Allen, who presided; the Rev. O.M. Walton, executive secretary of the Allegheny Council of Churches, who introduced the speaker; Dr. V.C. Hodges of the American Bible Society, Cleveland, Ohio the Rev. S.A. Amos, the Rev. B.F. Lee of Clairton, and Dr. William Fountain, newly elected secretary of education of the AME Church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. John H. Little, Bishop A. J. Allen, Billy Graham, Rev. O. M. Walton wearing striped suit, Dr. V. C. Hodges, Rev. S. A. Amos, Rev. B. F. Lee, and Dr. William Fountain, standing in Bethel AME Church for annual conference
